net.kencochrane.raven.event

Class EventBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kencochrane.raven.event.EventBuilder

  • public class EventBuilder
extends Object
    Builder to assist the creation of Events.

      • EventBuilder

        public EventBuilder()
        Creates a new EventBuilder to prepare a new Event.

        Automatically generates the id of the new event.

        Creates a new EventBuilder to prepare a new Event.
        Parameters:
        eventId - unique identifier for the new event.

        the current EventBuilder for chained calls.

      • addTag

        public EventBuilder addTag(String tagKey,
                  String tagValue)
        Adds a tag to an event.

        This allows to set a tag value in different contexts.

        Parameters:
        tagKey - name of the tag.
        tagValue - value of the tag.
        Returns:
        the current EventBuilder for chained calls.

      • setServerName

        public EventBuilder setServerName(String serverName)
        Sets the serverName in the event.
        Parameters:
        serverName - name of the server responsible for the event.
        Returns:
        the current EventBuilder for chained calls.

      • addExtra

        public EventBuilder addExtra(String extraName,
                    Object extraValue)
        Adds an extra property to the event.
        Parameters:
        extraName - name of the extra property.
        extraValue - value of the extra property.
        Returns:
        the current EventBuilder for chained calls.

      • generateChecksum

        public EventBuilder generateChecksum(String contentToChecksum)
        Generates a checksum from a given content and set it to the current event.
        Parameters:
        contentToChecksum - content to checksum.
        Returns:
        the current EventBuilder for chained calls.

      • setChecksum

        public EventBuilder setChecksum(String checksum)
        Sets the checksum for the current event.

        It's recommended to rely instead on the checksum system provided by Sentry.

        Parameters:
        checksum - checksum for the event.
        Returns:
        the current EventBuilder for chained calls.

      • addSentryInterface

        public EventBuilder addSentryInterface(SentryInterface sentryInterface)
        Adds a SentryInterface to the event.

        If a SentryInterface with the same interface name has already been added, the new one will replace the old one.

        Parameters:
        sentryInterface - sentry interface to add to the event.
        Returns:
        the current EventBuilder for chained calls.

      • build

        public Event build()
        Finalises the Event and returns it.

        This operations will automatically set the missing values and make the mutable values immutable.

        Returns:
        an immutable event.
